Title: Winky's Horse
Actors: Ebbie Tam, Aaron Wan, Hanyi Han, Jan Decleir
Plot: There is only one thing Winky wants: a horse, a real horse to ride. But horses are expensive. Fortunately it is the season of Sinterklaas; Winky just asks Sinterklaas for a horse. Then everything will work out alright. Or will it?
